posts.post_content:
I am looking to purchase T205's in VG & VG-EX condition. I am starting a set so my preference is acquiring cards in small to medium size lots. Ungraded cards are preferred but must be unaltered.  I will consider PSA & SGC cards as well.

Please send me a message if you've something to offer.  I would like to see scans prior to purchase as well.  In addition, I have about 20 PSA 3 and PSA 4cards to offer in trade if that's your thing.
